jobDescription: Summary The Project Auditor contributes to the ongoing development of the construction project and ensures that the project conforms to the framework of corporate standards and procedures. This person is responsible for supervising and conducting audits on US project sites, and conducts final review of construction project records verifying contractor compliance with state and federal requirements.  The Project Auditor also ensures the development of proper auditing programs for projects and verifies all expenses and costs incurred. This person will be engaged in monitoring the records and documentation of the project performing different investigations that support value judgment and identifying unnecessary costs and expenses incurred.
